title: Strengthening Nursing Practice Competencies: Reestablishing Theory for Learning Technology Research: Science Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational scientific theories and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can redefine the role of theory in learning technology research and integrate it into scientific instructional design.
Learners can validate and advance theories in scientific domains by applying learning design strategies.
Learners can develop science education programs suitable for mobile microlearning environments by applying instructional design research methodologies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
